reviews.text: Very good teacher. Is enthusiastic about teaching and always answeres questions.
Very knowledgable about the subjects he teaches. Expect alot of homework, but he gives you alot of starter code.
Cool teacher! Class is layed back but that atmosphere helps you learn alot about the material. Tests are difficult but very managable if you payed atention in class.
Great teacher! Really knows what he is talking about and is willing to help his students learn.
Difficult but really good. Teaches alot of new material that isn't typically taught in scool.
